hackathon-description-text: Over 700 students will gather for 36h of dreaming, hacking and shipping on anything and everything. All projects are welcome, mobile, hardware, web, you name it. Throughout the hackathon we'll have introductory talks for first time hackers as well as sponsor Tech Talks to help you out with your hacks!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Raspberry Pi 3 Official Desktop Starter Kit
Linkwitz Bluetooth Headphones & a Lifetime Todoist Premium Account
Raspberry Pi Zero (one per finisher team) + Raspberry Pi 3 & Self Driving Car Module (for each member of winning team)

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Carrer de Jordi Girona, 1, 08034 Barcelona, Spain

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How technically impressive was the hack? Was the technical problem the team tackled difficult? Did it use a particularly clever technique or did it use many different components? Did the technology involved make you go "Wow"

Did the team put thought into the user experience? How well designed is the interface? For a website, this might be about how beautiful the CSS or graphics are. For a hardware project, it might be more about how good the human-computer interaction is.
Does the hack work? Did the team achieve everything they wanted?
Did the team stretch themselves? Did they try to learn something new? What kind of projects have they worked on before?

hackathon-location-address: Carrer de Jordi Girona, 1, 08034 Barcelona, Spain
hackathon-description-header: BarcelonaTech student Hackathon. 700 hackers. 36 hours. Dream it. Hack it. Ship it.
